name: MoonDigger
description: Strange vibrations are seen on the moon! The brave cosmonaut Ivan dresses his suit and goes straight to the moon on a scientific expedition to find out the cause of the vibrations on the moon.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 70 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
